article_title: UN Gaza vote delayed as ceasefire calls grow
sentence: It  is  also  facing  pressure  at  home  for  a  deal  that  would  see  more  hostages  freed,  after  Israeli  soldiers  mistakenly  killed  three  Israeli  men  who  had  been  held  captive  in  Gaza  last  week.

article_title: UN Gaza vote delayed as ceasefire calls grow
sentence: Gaza  has  been  devastated  by  the  war,  which  was  triggered  by  an  unprecedented  cross-border  attack  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  at  least  1,200  people  were  killed  -  most  of  them  civilians  -  and  about  240  taken  hostage.

article_title: UN Gaza vote delayed as ceasefire calls grow
sentence: Since  then,  more  than  19,600  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  about  70%  of  them  women  and  children,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: UN Gaza vote delayed as ceasefire calls grow
sentence: It  reported  that  about  100  Palestinians  had  been  killed  in  Israeli  air  strikes  on  Tuesday.
